xml:
Bactroban Nasal<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

For eradication of nasal carriage of staphylococci, including meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA)

By intranasal administration

  • Child

    Apply 2–3 times a day for 5 days; a sample should be taken 2 days after treatment to confirm eradication. Course may be repeated if sample positive (and throat not colonised), dose to be applied to the inner surface of each nostril.

  • Adult

    Apply 2–3 times a day for 5 days; a sample should be taken 2 days after treatment to confirm eradication. Course may be repeated if sample positive (and throat not colonised), dose to be applied to the inner surface of each nostril.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
